attributes.action: Stop ageism and  sexist discrimination where bbc radio 1 blacklist  Madonna
attributes.additional_details: Paul McCartney David Bowie have been included in.playlists for BBC despite age . Madonna considered out of context or relevant to a radio 1 chart that she entered despite NO airplay .
attributes.background: Madonna is 60 yo  a constant creative artist that continues to forge and influence the music industry the highest earning touring artist with new album lead singles becoming the highest entry of the singles chart .This is ageist and sexist .

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.
	
You might like to write to the BBC to make this suggestion.
